body.p:
Lancaster. Nov. 4th 1864
To his Excellency T. E Bramlett.
Dear sir

accomaing these few lines you will find my petition to you certified to by but few names, not that they might not have been numerous, but I am relying on justice as well as your clemancy, the names appended to the petition are those that you know to be your personal & political friends, If after examining my clames you can consistently comply with my request you will confer a favor by synifying the same to me at Pant Lick Garrard Co, Ky,
